Introduction.name: Fatih Arapoğlu
Introduction.body: A software developer building end-to-end solutions with JavaScript/TypeScript, React, Next.js, Node.js, and integration technologies.

About.title: About Me
About.paragraph-1: I'm a Full-Stack & Integration Developer who builds end-to-end solutions using modern web technologies and integration layers.
About.paragraph-2: I began my career as a chemical engineer, working in process management and data analysis. That experience with problem-solving and structured thinking naturally led me into software development. I started with enterprise integration projects, gaining experience in data integrity, API architectures, and flow management for large-scale systems. Over time, I carried that expertise into product development—designing not just systems, but also user-facing applications.
About.paragraph-3: Today, I develop both front-end and back-end solutions using tools like Next.js, React, Node.js, and TypeScript, while also working on self-hosted infrastructure, CI/CD pipelines, database design, and deployment architectures.
About.paragraph-4: I value taking a project from concept to production, understanding every layer of the system, and collaborating effectively to deliver meaningful results.
About.paragraph-5: I’m based in Ankara, Turkey. Outside of work, I enjoy making music, playing video games, and exploring new technologies.

fettan.title: Fettan – Anonymous Chat Platform (2025)
fettan.description: A Next.js 15/16 social platform self-hosted with Supabase, Redis, Shadcn/UI, Docker, Coolify, Nginx, and Cloudflare. Includes realtime chat, stories, moderation tools, badges, random matching, analytics, monitoring, and abuse prevention.

news.title: LLM-powered News Application (2024)
news.description: A full-stack news platform featuring authentication, categories, infinite feed, publisher filtering, bookmarks, reports, lists, search history, user activity tracking, Shadcn components, and server-side filtering.

twitter.title: Twitter Clone (2023)
twitter.description: A fully featured social media clone with tweets, likes, retweets, messaging, notifications, bookmarks, profiles, infinite scrolling, image uploads, and SEO-optimized interface.

more.text: You can find more projects and recent work on my GitHub profile.
